text.data: Matelite: Sauzer!![end1][end]
Taicho: Look! It is Palpaleos!![end1][end]
Matelite: Everyone, listen up! No faltering!![end1][end]
Things aren't like they used to be...[end1]
Taicho: We will bring this to a conclusion,[0xfc][0x1] right here![end1][end]
Matelite: Princess [character][0x1]...[0xfc][0x1] Please watch over us...[end1][end]
Sauzer: Members of the Resistance,[0xfc][0x1] this has indeed been a lengthy war...[end1][end]
But it will carry on no longer. It ends right here![end1][end]
This I swear, upon my sword.[end1][end]
I must stop you.[0xfc][0x1] For I am the one who will fulfill the legend!![end1][end]
Palpaleos: ...She isn't here?[0xfc][0x1] [character][0x1]......[end1][end]
Sauzer: ...Princess [character][0x1]...[0xfc][0x1] How ironic...[end1][end]
...That we both fell ill to the same sickness...[end1][end]
Yet I am the only one able to conquer the menacing thoughts of the Holy Dragons...[end1][end]
Matelite: Prepare to attack!![end1][end]
Sendak: Occasionally there will be sandstorms,[0xfc][0x1] thus it is imperative that we keep watch for them.[end1][end]
And we must watch out for Sauzer and Palpaleos, too, of course.[end1][end]
“Condition for Victory:”[0xfc][0x1] “Defeat of Sauzer”[end]
Matelite: We've defeated Sauzer...[0xfc][0x1][end1][end]
Taicho: Sir Matelite!![0xfc][0x1] We are victorious!![end1][end]
Alright, let's head for that town.[0xfc][0x1] We need to find the Holy Dragon for Princess [character][0x1].[end1][end]
